Convoy turned to Kup. "The Raven fellow needs a Healing chamber stat, 
WingRazor could use one, but her enternal nano system seems to have 
kicked in.. a few hours and she'll be walking... but i'm sure she 
will not be flying." He turned to see Sabre. "How are you over there?"

Sabre stood near his fallen friends. "I'll be fine." He looked down 
at his black hide... no one could see the hair line cracks in his 
metallic joints. The dragon had gave him a thrashing, but his men 
came first... He nealt next to WingRazor. "Our Medical Lab was 
smashed in the crash...
